headline: Micron Plunges 8% on Sinking Margins: Time to Sell the Stock?
summary: The sequential decline in profitability, coupled with pricing pressures and bearish technical indicators, make MU stock a risky bet at current levels.

headline: Micron Technology: HBM Ramp-Up May Pressure Margins, But Stock Remains A Buy
